short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A networking contact management platform for Chrome, for use with unetwrk.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UNetwrk simplifies expanding and managing your professional network, helping you organize contacts and catalog communication.

UNetwrk auto-fills important information from LinkedIn profiles:
•Profile image
•Name
•Title
•Company
•LinkedIn profile URL

In addition to auto-fill, you can input the information yourself or simply highlight it on the page and it will fill the input field you’re focused on. 

The information is saved to contact cards that open on your UNetwrk contact management board. 

Features
•Add contact’s phone number
•Add contact’s email address
•Interaction notes to save the contact date and method, input notes, and set a reminder for next contact date
•Get notified on next contact date
•Timeline noting when you first connected and interactions
•Editable columns on your contact management board to organize contacts
•Add infinite number of columns
•Filter by name, title, or company
